conversations.english: Where can I find information on this subject?哪里能找到关于这个课题的资料？
conversations.chinese: 哪里能找到关于这个课题的资料？
conversations.reply_english: I'm not sure. Let's look up the catalogue.我不太清楚，还是查一下目录吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不太清楚，还是查一下目录吧。

conversations.english: How do I know if there is a vacancy in a company?怎么才能知道一个公司有没有职位空缺呢？
conversations.chinese: 怎么才能知道一个公司有没有职位空缺呢？
conversations.reply_english: Easy. View the home page of the company, and see if they need staff. Many websites offer two-way service, such as job-hunting and talent hunting.很简单。浏览公司网站主页，看看有没有人才需求。很多网站提供求职和猎头双向服务。
conversations.reply_chinese: 很简单。浏览公司网站主页，看看有没有人才需求。很多网站提供求职和猎头双向服务。

title: 周末加班Working overtime at weekends

conversations.english: I am really exhausted, you know, I have been working without the weekend for two weeks. My boss always asks us to work overtime.我真的筋疲力尽了，你知道吗，我已经有两周周末都在上班了。我的老板总叫我们加班。
conversations.chinese: 我真的筋疲力尽了，你知道吗，我已经有两周周末都在上班了。我的老板总叫我们加班。
conversations.reply_english: Does your boss pay you for the over-time work?那你们老板给不给你们加班费？
conversations.reply_chinese: 那你们老板给不给你们加班费？

conversations.english: Did you have any working experience during college?大学时你有什么工作经验吗？
conversations.chinese: 大学时你有什么工作经验吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I did some part-time jobs such as English tutor, salesman, and model.有，我做过一些兼职工作，比如当英语家教老师、营销员和模特。
conversations.reply_chinese: 有，我做过一些兼职工作，比如当英语家教老师、营销员和模特。

conversations.english: The operation in the lab is radioactive and dangerous, so work with care. Have you got ear muffs and gloves?实验室的操作环境有辐射，是有危险的。所以要小心操作。你拿到耳套和手套了吗？
conversations.chinese: 实验室的操作环境有辐射，是有危险的。所以要小心操作。你拿到耳套和手套了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Do I have to wear ear muffs and gloves? I am not used to working with them on.一定得戴吗？我不习惯戴着耳套和手套工作。
conversations.reply_chinese: 一定得戴吗？我不习惯戴着耳套和手套工作。

title: 去人才市场招聘会 To go to a job fair

conversations.english: Look, Mary! There are so many people over there!玛丽，你看！那边那么多人！
conversations.chinese: 玛丽，你看！那边那么多人！
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I remember, there is a job fair in the personnel market.噢，我想起来了，今天人才市场有招聘会。
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，我想起来了，今天人才市场有招聘会。

conversations.english: May I ask what the core value of the company is?我可以问一下公司的核心价值观是什么吗？
conversations.chinese: 我可以问一下公司的核心价值观是什么吗？
conversations.reply_english: The core values are credibilities, team work, diligence and devotion.我们公司的核心价值观是诚实守信，团结协作，勤奋努力和乐于奉献。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们公司的核心价值观是诚实守信，团结协作，勤奋努力和乐于奉献。

conversations.english: what are your strong points?你的长处是什么？
conversations.chinese: 你的长处是什么？
conversations.reply_english: well, I’m very good with people. I’m honorable. I work hard. I work well under pressure. And I’m patient.我擅长和人打交道，诚实老实，工作努力。我可以在压力下工作得很好。我很有耐心。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我擅长和人打交道，诚实老实，工作努力。我可以在压力下工作得很好。我很有耐心。

title: 我收到了工作录用通知

conversations.english: OMG! It must be so late where you are. What time is it?天啊!你那里一定很晚了,几点了?
conversations.chinese: 天啊!你那里一定很晚了,几点了?
conversations.reply_english: Just after 2 am.刚过凌晨两点.
conversations.reply_chinese: 刚过凌晨两点.

title: 你找到另一份工作了吗

conversations.english: Have you found another job yet, Sally?萨利，你找到另一份工作没有？
conversations.chinese: 萨利，你找到另一份工作没有？
conversations.reply_english: No, I haven't, but I've seen several interesting advertisements in the paper.不，还没有，但是我在报纸上看到几个令人感兴趣的广告。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，还没有，但是我在报纸上看到几个令人感兴趣的广告。

conversations.english: Can you speak Japanese?你会讲日语吗？
conversations.chinese: 你会讲日语吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,I can, but not very well.是的，我会但讲得不是很好。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我会但讲得不是很好。

conversations.english: Most of our customers are foreigners. How many foreign languages can you speak, Elizabeth?我们的大多数客户是外国人。你能说几种外语，伊丽莎白？
conversations.chinese: 我们的大多数客户是外国人。你能说几种外语，伊丽莎白？
conversations.reply_english: Two. French and Spanish.两种。法语和西班牙语
conversations.reply_chinese: 两种。法语和西班牙语

conversations.english: Can you tell me a little bit about yourself?你能简单介绍一下自己吗？
conversations.chinese: 你能简单介绍一下自己吗？
conversations.reply_english: I am a graduate of a technical university and have been employed as a technician with Company or approximately 10 years.我毕业于一所科技大学，在#公司做技术人员快十年了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我毕业于一所科技大学，在#公司做技术人员快十年了。

conversations.english: I’ve just looked over your resume and I must admit I am quite impressed.我已经看过你的简历了，我得承认我对你的简历印象不错。
conversations.chinese: 我已经看过你的简历了，我得承认我对你的简历印象不错。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you. I’ve worked pretty hard to be able to list those accomplishments.谢谢。由于我自己努力才能换来这些成果。
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢。由于我自己努力才能换来这些成果。

conversations.english: From reviewing your resume I can see that you have ample experience for this position.What I want to know is why you think you’re right for the job.从你的简历，我可以看出你在这方面有丰富的经验。我想知道为什么你认为你适合这份工作。
conversations.chinese: 从你的简历，我可以看出你在这方面有丰富的经验。我想知道为什么你认为你适合这份工作。
conversations.reply_english: Well I’m impressed with what the company has done in the past and I think by hiring me the company’s future can only be brighter. I find that my personal goals and ideas about business operations mesh perfectly with this company’s goals and mission statement.公司过去的业绩给我的印象很深，我认为公司雇佣我，公司的前景会更好。我觉得我的个人发展目标和商业理念和公司的目标完全吻合。
conversations.reply_chinese: 公司过去的业绩给我的印象很深，我认为公司雇佣我，公司的前景会更好。我觉得我的个人发展目标和商业理念和公司的目标完全吻合。

conversations.english: I really just have two problems with this.嗯，关于这一点我就有两点疑问。
conversations.chinese: 嗯，关于这一点我就有两点疑问。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, sir?什么问题，先生？
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么问题，先生？

conversations.english: Good morning. Please come into my office.早上好，请来我的办公室。
conversations.chinese: 早上好，请来我的办公室。
conversations.reply_english: Good morning. Thank you.早上好，谢谢。
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好，谢谢。

title: 应聘有线电视行业职位

conversations.english: Looking through your C.V., I see that you graduated from Oklahoma State University. Can you tell me what training you have had that would specifically relate to the cable television Industry?我看过你的简历了，你毕业于俄克拉马州州立大学。你能告诉我你有过哪些有线电视行业的培训吗?
conversations.chinese: 我看过你的简历了，你毕业于俄克拉马州州立大学。你能告诉我你有过哪些有线电视行业的培训吗?
conversations.reply_english: Well, I’ve attended some conferences in this field. But the most relevant training I’ve had was in computer design. I believe I could integrate that knowledge with my college degree to design a program for your company我参加过这个领域的一些讨论会。但大部分相关培训都是电脑设计。我相信我能够结合电脑设计和所学的知识开发出贵公司需要的新应用软件。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我参加过这个领域的一些讨论会。但大部分相关培训都是电脑设计。我相信我能够结合电脑设计和所学的知识开发出贵公司需要的新应用软件。

title: 你的工作找的怎么样了

conversations.english: How's your job search going?你的工作找得怎么样了?
conversations.chinese: 你的工作找得怎么样了?
conversations.reply_english: I only started looking for a job a few days ago.我几天前才开始找工作.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我几天前才开始找工作.

conversations.english: I really think if I can get my foot in the door at this company it will do wonders for my career. Do you think you can help me polish my interview style?我想只要我能进入这家公司，就会给我的事业带来奇迹。你能帮我润色一下简历吗？
conversations.chinese: 我想只要我能进入这家公司，就会给我的事业带来奇迹。你能帮我润色一下简历吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. Doing your homework and preparing for an interview really pays off.当然可以。在家做好面试准备工作是值得的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以。在家做好面试准备工作是值得的。

conversations.english: Would you consider an offer of $56,000 per year?年薪五万六千美元，可以考虑吗？
conversations.chinese: 年薪五万六千美元，可以考虑吗？
conversations.reply_english: What kind of benefits are we talking about?那么福利怎么样？
conversations.reply_chinese: 那么福利怎么样？

conversations.english: How's your job search going?工作找的怎么样了?
conversations.chinese: 工作找的怎么样了?
conversations.reply_english: I don't know. I only started looking for a job a few days ago.我不知道.我前几天才刚开始找的.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不知道.我前几天才刚开始找的.

conversations.english: Are you ready for your big interview tomorrow?你准备好明天那个重要的面试了吗？
conversations.chinese: 你准备好明天那个重要的面试了吗？
conversations.reply_english: What’s to get ready?要准备些什么呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 要准备些什么呢？

conversations.english: Thank you for agreeing to come in and meet with us today.感谢您今天能来参加面试。
conversations.chinese: 感谢您今天能来参加面试。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you for inviting me.谢谢你们的邀请。
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你们的邀请。

conversations.english: I just received a phone call for an interview next week.我刚接到一个电话,要我下星期去面试
conversations.chinese: 我刚接到一个电话,要我下星期去面试
conversations.reply_english: Congratulations! This is your first interview ever.恭喜你!这是你的第一次面试机会.
conversations.reply_chinese: 恭喜你!这是你的第一次面试机会.

title: 我需要更有挑战的职位

conversations.english: Okay, now I’d like to find out more about your last job.I see you spent almost four years at the London Weekly , is that right?现在我想了解更多你上份工作的信息。我看到简历上写你在 《伦敦周报》呆了4年，对吧？
conversations.chinese: 现在我想了解更多你上份工作的信息。我看到简历上写你在 《伦敦周报》呆了4年，对吧？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, that’s right. To be honest, the first year was quite tough for me. I was really just treated more like an intern. I didn’t have many responsibilities and I found it quite frustrating.是的，说实话，第1年对我来说很困难。我第1年更像是实习生的待遇。我没有太多职责，我发现这很令人沮丧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，说实话，第1年对我来说很困难。我第1年更像是实习生的待遇。我没有太多职责，我发现这很令人沮丧。

conversations.english: Okay,Rebecca.Now you’ve given me a good idea of your work and academic background, but what about you as a person? How would you describe your key strengths?Rebecca现在你已经告诉我你的工作和教育背景，谈下你自己行吗？你能描述下你的主要优点吗？
conversations.chinese: Rebecca现在你已经告诉我你的工作和教育背景，谈下你自己行吗？你能描述下你的主要优点吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, Mr.Parsons, as I mentioned before I’m someone who needs new challenges.I’m really focused and hard-working. I think my academic results prove this.好的，Parsons先生，就像先前我提到的，我是个需要新挑战的人。我工作专心而且特别努力。我想我的学习成绩已经证明了这一点。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，Parsons先生，就像先前我提到的，我是个需要新挑战的人。我工作专心而且特别努力。我想我的学习成绩已经证明了这一点。

title: 明天结束候选人的面试

conversations.english: Well Rebecca, is there anything else you need to know for now?Rebecca，你现在还想了解些其他的事吗？
conversations.chinese: Rebecca，你现在还想了解些其他的事吗？
conversations.reply_english: I don’t think so, Mr. Parsons. I think you have covered all the main points for me.Parsons先生，我想我没有问题了。你已经向我介绍了所有的要点。
conversations.reply_chinese: Parsons先生，我想我没有问题了。你已经向我介绍了所有的要点。

conversations.english: Excuse me. I have an appointment with Mr. Li at nine. May I come in?打扰一下，我和李先生九点钟有个约会，我可以进来吗？
conversations.chinese: 打扰一下，我和李先生九点钟有个约会，我可以进来吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, come in please. I am Mr. Li. You must be Mz Liu, right？请进，我就是李先生，你肯定是刘小姐吧？
conversations.reply_chinese: 请进，我就是李先生，你肯定是刘小姐吧？

conversations.english: Now, Miss Childs passed on your resume to me and I’ve had the chance to look it over and I must say I’m quite impressed.蔡尔兹小姐请把你的简历递给我。我能有机会来仔细看看，我必须说我对你印象深刻。
conversations.chinese: 蔡尔兹小姐请把你的简历递给我。我能有机会来仔细看看，我必须说我对你印象深刻。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you very much.I’ve tried to keep it short and clear.If there’s any questions please feel free to ask me.非常感谢。我尽量让简历简单明了。如果有问题，请尽管问我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 非常感谢。我尽量让简历简单明了。如果有问题，请尽管问我。

title: 我真的很喜欢这份工作

conversations.english: Now, if I look here I see that you completed a BA in English?现在我看这部分，得知你已经获得了英语文学艺术学士学位?
conversations.chinese: 现在我看这部分，得知你已经获得了英语文学艺术学士学位?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, that’s right. After graduating from high school in New York I attended York University in the UK. My major was English, and my minor was business studies. I completed my BA in 2004.是的，在纽约上完高中后，我进纽约大学就读。我的专业是英语，我的辅修科目是商务学习，在2004年我得到了艺术文学学位。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，在纽约上完高中后，我进纽约大学就读。我的专业是英语，我的辅修科目是商务学习，在2004年我得到了艺术文学学位。

conversations.english: Which university did you graduate from?你是哪个学校毕业的？
conversations.chinese: 你是哪个学校毕业的？
conversations.reply_english: I graduated from Hebei University.我毕业于河北大学。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我毕业于河北大学。

title: 你实习之后做什么了呢

conversations.english: Right Rebecca. Now I see that after graduating from University your first job was...好的，Rebecca，你大学毕业后的第一份工作是……
conversations.chinese: 好的，Rebecca，你大学毕业后的第一份工作是……
conversations.reply_english: For a local paper in York called the York Herald. Actually, I started with them as an intern in the beginning. I was really keen on getting some experience in the journalism, and this seemed like a good first step我在纽约为一所叫做York Herald当地报纸工作，一开始我是实习生。我很喜欢在新闻行业学些经验，这看起来是很不错的选择。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在纽约为一所叫做York Herald当地报纸工作，一开始我是实习生。我很喜欢在新闻行业学些经验，这看起来是很不错的选择。

conversations.english: Do you have s second?你有空吗?
conversations.chinese: 你有空吗?
conversations.reply_english: sure. What do you want?当然,怎么啦?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然,怎么啦?

conversations.english: Why don't you begin by telling me something about yourself?你就从谈谈你自己开始吧！
conversations.chinese: 你就从谈谈你自己开始吧！
conversations.reply_english: What do you want to know?你想知道些什么？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你想知道些什么？

conversations.english: Come in.请进。
conversations.chinese: 请进。
conversations.reply_english: Mr Parsons ?Parsons 先生？
conversations.reply_chinese: Parsons 先生？

conversations.english: Which school are you attending?你在哪个学校上学？
conversations.chinese: 你在哪个学校上学？
conversations.reply_english: I am attending Hebei University of Technology.我在河北工业大学上学。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在河北工业大学上学。

conversations.english: Tell me something about your work experience.说说你的工作经验吧。
conversations.chinese: 说说你的工作经验吧。
conversations.reply_english: Well, I have been in the computer engineering field for 6 years now. I am familiar with both hardware and software and with hands-on experience in system development including system analysis and design.好的，我到现在为止已经在计算机工程行业工作6年了。我对硬件和软件都很熟悉，并具有系统开发的实际操作经验，包括系统分析和设计。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，我到现在为止已经在计算机工程行业工作6年了。我对硬件和软件都很熟悉，并具有系统开发的实际操作经验，包括系统分析和设计。

conversations.english: What is your name, please?请问，你叫什么名字？
conversations.chinese: 请问，你叫什么名字？
conversations.reply_english: My name is Sun lin.我叫孙林。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我叫孙林。

conversations.english: Excuse me. May I see Mrs. Smith?不好意思，我可以见史密斯女士吗？
conversations.chinese: 不好意思，我可以见史密斯女士吗？
conversations.reply_english: It's me. What can I do for you?我就是，需要我帮忙吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我就是，需要我帮忙吗？

conversations.english: Tell me a little bit about yourself, please.能告诉我一些你自己的情况吗？
conversations.chinese: 能告诉我一些你自己的情况吗？
conversations.reply_english: My name is Sunlin and I live in Beijing. I was born in 1980. I will graduate from Peking University this July. I have majored in accounting.我叫孙林，住在北京。我出生于1980年。今年七月将从北京大学毕业，我主修的专业是会计学。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我叫孙林，住在北京。我出生于1980年。今年七月将从北京大学毕业，我主修的专业是会计学。

title: 问几个不是很有礼貌问题

conversations.english: Mr.Sun,would you mind if I ask you some questions, which may sound impolite?孙先生，我可以问你几个听起来可能不是很有礼貌的问题吗？
conversations.chinese: 孙先生，我可以问你几个听起来可能不是很有礼貌的问题吗？
conversations.reply_english: Ah,never mind, please.啊，没关系，请问吧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 啊，没关系，请问吧。

title: 感谢你来我们公司面试

conversations.english: Do you have any questions you want to ask?你有什么问题要问吗？
conversations.chinese: 你有什么问题要问吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd like to know if there would be any future opportunities for specific training.有，我想知道贵公司将来是否提供特殊培训的机会。
conversations.reply_chinese: 有，我想知道贵公司将来是否提供特殊培训的机会。

title: 你个性上最大的特点是什么

conversations.english: What kind of character do you think you have?你认为你是什么性格的人？
conversations.chinese: 你认为你是什么性格的人？
conversations.reply_english: Generally speaking，l am an open-minded person.总的来说，我是个思想很开明的人。
conversations.reply_chinese: 总的来说，我是个思想很开明的人。

conversations.english: Could you project what you would like to be doing five years from now?你能设想一下五年后你在做些什么吗？
conversations.chinese: 你能设想一下五年后你在做些什么吗？
conversations.reply_english: As I have some administrative experience from my last job, I may use my organizational and planning skills in the future.因为我以前的工作积累了一些管理经验，我希望将来能运用我的组织和计划才能。
conversations.reply_chinese: 因为我以前的工作积累了一些管理经验，我希望将来能运用我的组织和计划才能。

conversations.english: Are you a goal-oriented person?你是一个有明确目标的人吗？
conversations.chinese: 你是一个有明确目标的人吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I am. I always make a plan before I do anything.是的，我是，在做每件事之前我都做一个计划。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我是，在做每件事之前我都做一个计划。

conversations.english: Our advertisement says English competence is a key requirement of this position. Then how do you think of your proficiency in written and spoken English?我们的招聘广告要求这个职位的应聘者应当具有相当好的英语水平，那么，你认为你的书面英语和口语能力如何呢？
conversations.chinese: 我们的招聘广告要求这个职位的应聘者应当具有相当好的英语水平，那么，你认为你的书面英语和口语能力如何呢？
conversations.reply_english: I have learned English for 10 years, and I have passed College English Test Band 4 and 6.My spoken English is fairly good enough to express myself fluently.我已经学英语10年了，而且我通过了大学英语四级和六级。我能用英语把自己的想法流利地表达出来。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我已经学英语10年了，而且我通过了大学英语四级和六级。我能用英语把自己的想法流利地表达出来。

conversations.english: Hello, this is Sunlin. May I speak to Mrs Smith?你好，我是孙林。我可以和史密斯女士通话吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好，我是孙林。我可以和史密斯女士通话吗？
conversations.reply_english: This is Mrs Smith. Can I help you?我就是史密斯，需要什么帮助吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我就是史密斯，需要什么帮助吗？

title: 你的履历表令人印象深刻

conversations.english: Well, I’ve looked over your resume, Mr. Peepers.哦，我看过了你的履历表，皮伯斯先生。
conversations.chinese: 哦，我看过了你的履历表，皮伯斯先生。
conversations.reply_english: Please, call me Ted.请叫我特德好了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 请叫我特德好了。

conversations.english: How much do you expect to earn?你希望挣多少钱？
conversations.chinese: 你希望挣多少钱？
conversations.reply_english: I think salary is closely related to the responsibilities of the job. Shall we discuss my responsibilities with your company first?我觉得工资是与工作的责任紧密相关的，我们能不能先谈我在贵公司需要承担的责任？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得工资是与工作的责任紧密相关的，我们能不能先谈我在贵公司需要承担的责任？

title: 你打算在这里工作多久

conversations.english: How long do you plan to stay here?你打算在这里工作多久？
conversations.chinese: 你打算在这里工作多久？
conversations.reply_english: To speak frankly, it doesn't depend on me.坦白地说，这不是我能决定的。
conversations.reply_chinese: 坦白地说，这不是我能决定的。

title: 你理想的工作是什么样的

conversations.english: How would you describe your ideal job?你理想的工作是什么样的？
conversations.chinese: 你理想的工作是什么样的？
conversations.reply_english: I think the job should make use of the professional experience I have obtained, and offer me opportunity for advancement.我认为应该能发挥我掌握的专业知识，而且能为我提供升职的机会。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我认为应该能发挥我掌握的专业知识，而且能为我提供升职的机会。

title: 你大学时学习成绩如何

conversations.english: Have you received any degrees?你有获得学位吗？
conversations.chinese: 你有获得学位吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. In 1996 I received my Bachelor of Science degree from Hebei University, and in 2001 I received my MBA degree from Peking University.有，1996年我在河北大学获得了理学学士学位，2001年在北京大学获得了工商管理硕士学位。
conversations.reply_chinese: 有，1996年我在河北大学获得了理学学士学位，2001年在北京大学获得了工商管理硕士学位。

conversations.english: Well, that's all for the interview. Thank you for your interest in this job.好了，面试到此结束，非常感谢你来面试这份工作。
conversations.chinese: 好了，面试到此结束，非常感谢你来面试这份工作。
conversations.reply_english: You are welcome. Thank you for taking time out of your busy schedule to interview me.不用谢。也非常感谢你在百忙中抽出时间来面试我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 不用谢。也非常感谢你在百忙中抽出时间来面试我。

conversations.english: Hey Ted, I saw this ad in the paper. You should take a look.嘿，特德，我看到报纸上的这篇广告，你该看一看。
conversations.chinese: 嘿，特德，我看到报纸上的这篇广告，你该看一看。
conversations.reply_english: What is it?是什么广告？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是什么广告？

conversations.english: What's your expected salary?你希望的薪酬是多少？
conversations.chinese: 你希望的薪酬是多少？
conversations.reply_english: I expect to be paid according to my abilities.我希望根据我的能力支付薪酬。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我希望根据我的能力支付薪酬。

conversations.english: Tell me about yourself and your past experience.说说你自己和你过去的经历吧。
conversations.chinese: 说说你自己和你过去的经历吧。
conversations.reply_english: I have worked as an executive secretary for 5 years, first for trading companies, and now I am working for a trust company. I interact well with peers, clients, administrators and bosses. I thrive on challenge and work well in high-stress environments.我已经做执行秘书五年了，开始是为一家贸易公司工作，现在是一家信托公司。我和同事、客户、行政管理员以及老板相处得非常好。我能应付挑战，而且在高压力环境中也能工作很出色。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我已经做执行秘书五年了，开始是为一家贸易公司工作，现在是一家信托公司。我和同事、客户、行政管理员以及老板相处得非常好。我能应付挑战，而且在高压力环境中也能工作很出色。

conversations.english: What kind of jobs have you had?你都做过什么工作？
conversations.chinese: 你都做过什么工作？
conversations.reply_english: I have been a Production Manager.我做过生产经理。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我做过生产经理。

title: 你觉得自己的个性如何

conversations.english: What kind of person do you think you are?你觉得你自己的个性如何？
conversations.chinese: 你觉得你自己的个性如何？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I am always energetic and enthusiastic. That's my strongest personality.嗯，我觉得自己精力很充沛，做事很有热情。这是我最大的特点了。
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，我觉得自己精力很充沛，做事很有热情。这是我最大的特点了。

title: 从以前的工作中学到了什么

conversations.english: Do you have any work experience in this field?你有这个行业的工作经验吗？
conversations.chinese: 你有这个行业的工作经验吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. After my graduation from university, I worked as a Customer Service Coordinator in a foreign representative office, and then I transferred to a joint venture as a Market Development Manager. So I am familiar with the market in China.有，在我大学毕业后，我就到一家外企代理处做了一名顾客服务协调员，之后我转到一家合资企业做市场发展部经理，所以我对中国市场非常熟悉。
conversations.reply_chinese: 有，在我大学毕业后，我就到一家外企代理处做了一名顾客服务协调员，之后我转到一家合资企业做市场发展部经理，所以我对中国市场非常熟悉。

title: 我对这个职位很感兴趣

conversations.english: Hello, BCD Company, can I help you?你好，这里是BCD公司，您需要帮助吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好，这里是BCD公司，您需要帮助吗？
conversations.reply_english: Hello, may I speak to Mrs Smith?你好，我可以和史密斯女士通话吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 你好，我可以和史密斯女士通话吗？

conversations.english: What is your salary at present?你现在的薪水是多少？
conversations.chinese: 你现在的薪水是多少？
conversations.reply_english: My present pay is 100,000 Yuan per year.每年10万元。
conversations.reply_chinese: 每年10万元。

title: 你以前的工作具体做什么

conversations.english: Good moring, madam. Can I help you?早上好，夫人，需要我帮忙吗？
conversations.chinese: 早上好，夫人，需要我帮忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: Good moring. I am Sunfang. Yesterday Mr. Smith told me to come for a job interview this morning. Is he available now?早上好，我叫孙芳。昨天史密斯先生通知我今天早上来面试，他现在有时间吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 早上好，我叫孙芳。昨天史密斯先生通知我今天早上来面试，他现在有时间吗？

conversations.english: Anything else?还有其它的吗？
conversations.chinese: 还有其它的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, one last thing. How much holiday time do you give your employees every year?是的，还有最后一件事。每年你们提供给员工的假期怎样的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，还有最后一件事。每年你们提供给员工的假期怎样的？

conversations.english: This is Sunlin. Is this Mrs Smith speaking?我是孙林，您是史密斯先生吗？
conversations.chinese: 我是孙林，您是史密斯先生吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, what can I do for you?是的，您有什么需要帮助的吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，您有什么需要帮助的吗？

conversations.english: Good morning, my name is Martin. You've applied for the Laboratory Assistant's position, right?早上好，我叫马丁，你申请了实验室助理这个职位，对吧？
conversations.chinese: 早上好，我叫马丁，你申请了实验室助理这个职位，对吧？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. When I saw the advertisement I thought it would really suit me.是的。当我看到广告时，我想这个职位非常适合我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。当我看到广告时，我想这个职位非常适合我。

conversations.english: Good morning. I came in answer to your advertisement for a salesperson.早上好，我是为你们登的招聘销售员的广告而来的。
conversations.chinese: 早上好，我是为你们登的招聘销售员的广告而来的。
conversations.reply_english: I see. Will you walk this way, please? What experience have you had?我知道，请这边来。你有工作经验吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道，请这边来。你有工作经验吗？

conversations.english: Come in, please.请进。
conversations.chinese: 请进。
conversations.reply_english: Good afternoon, Mrs Smith.下午好，史密斯女士。
conversations.reply_chinese: 下午好，史密斯女士。

conversations.english: Tell me about yourself and your past experience.说说你自己和你过去的经历。
conversations.chinese: 说说你自己和你过去的经历。
conversations.reply_english: For the past 3 years, I have been working in China East Airlines Corporation Limited. I'm very tolerant of people and have been told that this is one of my strengths. I feel I have a lot to offer as a team member.过去三年我一直在中国东方航空有限公司工作。我待人宽容，别人都说这是我的优点。我想作为团队一员，我能作出很多贡献。
conversations.reply_chinese: 过去三年我一直在中国东方航空有限公司工作。我待人宽容，别人都说这是我的优点。我想作为团队一员，我能作出很多贡献。

conversations.english: Excuse me, sir. I am coming to apply for the position of accountant.先生，打扰你了，我是来应聘会计师的。
conversations.chinese: 先生，打扰你了，我是来应聘会计师的。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, please sit down. What university did you graduate from?好，请坐吧。你是哪个大学毕业的？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好，请坐吧。你是哪个大学毕业的？

conversations.english: Excuse me, I am Sunlin. I am here about your advertisement for a tourist guide. Are there still any vacancies?你好，我是孙林。我是为贵公司登的招聘导游的广告而来，还有空缺吗？
conversations.chinese: 你好，我是孙林。我是为贵公司登的招聘导游的广告而来，还有空缺吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. One more is needed.有，还需要一名。
conversations.reply_chinese: 有，还需要一名。

conversations.english: Can I help you?有什么我能帮忙的吗？
conversations.chinese: 有什么我能帮忙的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. I sent in my resume at the end of last week.I'm applying for the accounts assistant position.是的，上个星期末我寄了我的履历表。我申请客户助理的职位。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，上个星期末我寄了我的履历表。我申请客户助理的职位。

conversations.english: What made you decide on this type of occupation?什么原因使你决定投身这个行业呢？
conversations.chinese: 什么原因使你决定投身这个行业呢？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, to tell you the truth, I love the sky. When I was a child, I imagined flying into the blue sky some day. Now, I think the day has come. My dream will come true. And I like travelling very much and I enjoy working with people.哦，说真的，我非常喜欢蓝天。小时候我就梦想自己有一天能飞上蓝天，现在我想这一天已经到了，我的梦想要实现了。而且我非常喜欢旅游，喜欢和人打交道。
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，说真的，我非常喜欢蓝天。小时候我就梦想自己有一天能飞上蓝天，现在我想这一天已经到了，我的梦想要实现了。而且我非常喜欢旅游，喜欢和人打交道。

conversations.english: Please tell me something about your insurance background.请讲讲你在保险行业的从业经验。
conversations.chinese: 请讲讲你在保险行业的从业经验。
conversations.reply_english: I majored in international banking at college so I took many insurance courses. And I worked at an insurance company for my graduation field work.我大学时主修国际银行业务，所以我学了许多保险课程, 并且我在一家保险公司进行了我的毕业设计。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我大学时主修国际银行业务，所以我学了许多保险课程, 并且我在一家保险公司进行了我的毕业设计。

conversations.english: May I have your resume,please?可以看看你的简历吗？
conversations.chinese: 可以看看你的简历吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,I need a job that can give full play to my skills.可以,我需要一份能发挥我一技之长的工作.
conversations.reply_chinese: 可以,我需要一份能发挥我一技之长的工作.

conversations.english: Have you ever worked as a tour guide?你当过导游吗?
conversations.chinese: 你当过导游吗?
conversations.reply_english: I have a little experience. I guided a few foreign tourists around Beijing last year as a part-time job. I showed them to the Great Wall, the Imperial Palace, and the Summer Palace.我有一点经验。去年我带领一些外国旅客在北京观光，那是份兼职工作。我带领他们去了长城、故宫和颐和园。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我有一点经验。去年我带领一些外国旅客在北京观光，那是份兼职工作。我带领他们去了长城、故宫和颐和园。

conversations.english: I see by your resume that you have been working?你的简历上说你一直在工作吗？
conversations.chinese: 你的简历上说你一直在工作吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I have worked for four years with a Canadian Company.是的，我在一家加拿大公司工作过4年。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我在一家加拿大公司工作过4年。

conversations.english: Why do you think you are qualified for this position?你为什么认为你适合这份工作？
conversations.chinese: 你为什么认为你适合这份工作？
conversations.reply_english: I have four years study in the Department of Mechanical Engineering and it has given me a solid theory foundation. Moreover, I have worked at CBA Company for 4 years and got a lot of practical experience.我在机械工程系学了4年，这为我的理论水平打下了坚实的基础。而且我在CBA公司工作了4年，获得了丰富的实际经验。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在机械工程系学了4年，这为我的理论水平打下了坚实的基础。而且我在CBA公司工作了4年，获得了丰富的实际经验。

title: 有没有兼职工作的经验

conversations.english: Did you have a part-time job when you were still in school?你读书期间有没有兼职工作的经验？
conversations.chinese: 你读书期间有没有兼职工作的经验？
conversations.reply_english: No, I was way too busy studying all the time. How about you?没有，我总是忙着学习，你呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 没有，我总是忙着学习，你呢？

title: 你想找份什么样的工作

conversations.english: Tell me about yourself.说说你的情况吧。
conversations.chinese: 说说你的情况吧。
conversations.reply_english: I was born and raised in Beijing. I attended Peking University and received my bachelor's degree in Economics. I have worked for 2 years as a financial consultant in Beijing for China Pacific Insurance Co. Ltd.我出生于北京，并在那里长大。我考入北京大学，获得了经济学学士学位。 我在中国太平洋保险股份有限公司做了两年的金融顾问。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我出生于北京，并在那里长大。我考入北京大学，获得了经济学学士学位。 我在中国太平洋保险股份有限公司做了两年的金融顾问。

conversations.english: It says here that you graduated from Beijing Normal University with a major in English Language and Literature.上面说你毕业于北京师范大学英语语言文学专业。
conversations.chinese: 上面说你毕业于北京师范大学英语语言文学专业。
conversations.reply_english: Right. Then you may think that I am not fit for this job according to my educational background.对。你可能认为我的教育背景并不适合这份工作。
conversations.reply_chinese: 对。你可能认为我的教育背景并不适合这份工作。

title: 你很相信自己的经验技术

conversations.english: We need a person who knows how to operate and repair all kinds of office appliances.我们需要一位能使用、维修各种办公设备的人
conversations.chinese: 我们需要一位能使用、维修各种办公设备的人
conversations.reply_english: I used to hold a similar job for six years.类似的工作我干了六年。
conversations.reply_chinese: 类似的工作我干了六年。

conversations.english: Hello Mr. Jones, please have a seat. Thank you for coming in today. I have read your resume. You completed University in England?你好,琼斯先生!请坐.谢谢你今天能来.你的简历我已看过.你在英国上的大学?
conversations.chinese: 你好,琼斯先生!请坐.谢谢你今天能来.你的简历我已看过.你在英国上的大学?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I went to Cambridge. After graduation, I started right away into the advertising industry. Later, I made a bit of a switch to focus on marketing research.是的,上的剑桥大学.毕业后,我就干起了广告工作,后来转向了市场调查.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的,上的剑桥大学.毕业后,我就干起了广告工作,后来转向了市场调查.

title: 你能帮我校对一下简历吗

conversations.english: Could you do me a favor and proofread my resume before I send it out to the human recources department?我把简历寄给人力资源部之前，你能帮忙校对一下吗？
conversations.chinese: 我把简历寄给人力资源部之前，你能帮忙校对一下吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure, let me take a look... Personal Information, Education, Experience, Training... I think you should add another section for language. You speak three languages, so you might as well put that on your resume.当然可以,让我看看……个人信息、教育、经历、培训……我认为你应该把这一项再加上。你会讲三种语言，所以最好把这些写进简历。
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然可以,让我看看……个人信息、教育、经历、培训……我认为你应该把这一项再加上。你会讲三种语言，所以最好把这些写进简历。

conversations.english: What sort of job would you like to take?你想做什么样的工作？
conversations.chinese: 你想做什么样的工作？
conversations.reply_english: I prefer a sedentary job and I used to work as an operator.我喜欢静一点的工作,我曾经当过接线员.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢静一点的工作,我曾经当过接线员.

title: 我以前干过类似的工作

conversations.english: Are you familiar with the office management?你熟悉办公室的管理工作吗？
conversations.chinese: 你熟悉办公室的管理工作吗？
conversations.reply_english: I have done something like that before.以前干过类似的工作。
conversations.reply_chinese: 以前干过类似的工作。

conversations.english: Could you tell me a little about the organization? For example, how big is your workforce here?你能告诉一些关于公司的情况吗？比如说，你们那儿有多少员工？
conversations.chinese: 你能告诉一些关于公司的情况吗？比如说，你们那儿有多少员工？
conversations.reply_english: Well in total we have around 150 employees based in Hong Kong with another 400 in our head office in Beijing. The news desk staff in Hong Kong comprises around 80 staff.在香港我们大概有150名员工，北京总部有400名员工,香港新闻部大概有80名职员。
conversations.reply_chinese: 在香港我们大概有150名员工，北京总部有400名员工,香港新闻部大概有80名职员。

conversations.english: I'm really in a flap about the interview.想到面试我心慌极了。
conversations.chinese: 想到面试我心慌极了。
conversations.reply_english: Take it easy.you've made enough preparations.别担心.你已经做好了充分的准备。
conversations.reply_chinese: 别担心.你已经做好了充分的准备。

conversations.english: Okay, well I’m sure you have a number of questions to ask me regarding the position.现在，我敢保证有关那个职位你有很多问题要问。
conversations.chinese: 现在，我敢保证有关那个职位你有很多问题要问。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, well Miss Childs did give a mean overview of the position over the phone, but there were some details I’d like to clarify.是的。Miss Childs在电话中给我进行了概要的介绍，但是还有些细节我想搞清楚。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。Miss Childs在电话中给我进行了概要的介绍，但是还有些细节我想搞清楚。

conversations.english: Right Rebecca. Now I see that after graduating from University your first job was...好的，Rebecca，你大学毕业后的第一份工作是……
conversations.chinese: 好的，Rebecca，你大学毕业后的第一份工作是……
conversations.reply_english: For a local paper in York called the York Herald. Actually, I started with them as an intern in the beginning. I was really keen on getting some experience in the journalistic world, and this seemed like a good first step.我在纽约为一所叫做York Herald当地报纸工作，一开始我是实习生。我很喜欢在新闻行业学些经验，这看起来是很不错的选择。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在纽约为一所叫做York Herald当地报纸工作，一开始我是实习生。我很喜欢在新闻行业学些经验，这看起来是很不错的选择。

conversations.english: Now, if I look here I see that you completed a BA in English?现在我看这部分，得知你已经获得了英语文学艺术学士学位?
conversations.chinese: 现在我看这部分，得知你已经获得了英语文学艺术学士学位?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, that’s right. After graduating from high school in New York I attended York University in the UK. My major was English, and my minor was business studies. I completed my BA in 2004.是的，在纽约上完高中后，我进纽约大学就读。我的专业是英语，我的辅修科目是商务学习，在2004年我得到了艺术文学学位。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，在纽约上完高中后，我进纽约大学就读。我的专业是英语，我的辅修科目是商务学习，在2004年我得到了艺术文学学位。

conversations.english: Okay, now I’d like to find out more about your last job. I see you spent almost four years at the London Weekly , is that right?现在我想了解更多你上份工作的信息。我看到简历上写你在《伦敦周报》呆了4年，对吧？
conversations.chinese: 现在我想了解更多你上份工作的信息。我看到简历上写你在《伦敦周报》呆了4年，对吧？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, that’s right. To be honest, the first year was quite tough for me. I was really just treated more like an intern. I didn’t have many responsibilities and I found it quite frustrating.是的，说实话，第1年对我来说很困难。我第1年更像是实习生的待遇。我没有太多职责，我发现这很令人沮丧。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，说实话，第1年对我来说很困难。我第1年更像是实习生的待遇。我没有太多职责，我发现这很令人沮丧。

conversations.english: Okay，Rebecca. Now you’ve given me a good idea of your work and academic background, but what about you as a person? How would you describe your key strengths?Rebecca现在你已经告诉我你的工作和教育背景，谈下你自己行吗？你能描述下你的主要优点吗？
conversations.chinese: Rebecca现在你已经告诉我你的工作和教育背景，谈下你自己行吗？你能描述下你的主要优点吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well，Mr. Parsons, as I mentioned before I’m someone who needs new challenges. I’m really focused and hard-working. I think my academic results prove this.好的，Parsons先生，就像先前我提到的，我是个需要新挑战的人。我工作专心而且特别努力。我想我的学习成绩已经证明了这一点。
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，Parsons先生，就像先前我提到的，我是个需要新挑战的人。我工作专心而且特别努力。我想我的学习成绩已经证明了这一点。

conversations.english: Okay Rebecca, well I think you’ve given me a clear impression of your positive qualities, but let’s talk a little bit about your weaknesses.好吧，Rebecca，我想对你的优点你已经给我留下清晰的印象。我们来谈下你的缺点吧。
conversations.chinese: 好吧，Rebecca，我想对你的优点你已经给我留下清晰的印象。我们来谈下你的缺点吧。
conversations.reply_english: Okay, well it’s always more difficult to describe them isn’t it?好的，描述缺点总有点困难，不是吗？
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，描述缺点总有点困难，不是吗？

conversations.english: Well Rebecca, is there anything else you need to know for now?Rebecca，你现在还想了解些其他的事吗？
conversations.chinese: Rebecca，你现在还想了解些其他的事吗？
conversations.reply_english: I don’t think so, Mr. Parsons. I think you have covered all the main points for me.Parsons先生，我想我没有问题了。你已经向我介绍了所有的要点。
conversations.reply_chinese: Parsons先生，我想我没有问题了。你已经向我介绍了所有的要点。

conversations.english: Come in.请进。
conversations.chinese: 请进。
conversations.reply_english: Mr Parsons?Parsons先生吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: Parsons先生吗?

title: 在工作上你有哪些长处

conversations.english: So Vicky, how long have you held your present position?所以，Vicky，你目前的工作做多久了？
conversations.chinese: 所以，Vicky，你目前的工作做多久了？
conversations.reply_english: I’ve been a secretary for two years, before that I was at university.我当秘书有两年了，在那之前我在念大学。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我当秘书有两年了，在那之前我在念大学。

title: 应聘空姐To be a stewardess

conversations.english: Why do you want to be a stewardess?你为什么想成为一名空姐？
conversations.chinese: 你为什么想成为一名空姐？
conversations.reply_english: I have always enjoyed flying. And I am good with people.因为我一直喜欢飞行。而且我善于和人打交道。
conversations.reply_chinese: 因为我一直喜欢飞行。而且我善于和人打交道。

conversations.english: May I help you?我能帮你什么忙吗？
conversations.chinese: 我能帮你什么忙吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'm looking for a job as a clerk typist in English.是的，我正在找英文办事打字员的工作。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我正在找英文办事打字员的工作。

conversations.english: How is your job search going, Janet?珍妮特，你的工作找得怎么样？
conversations.chinese: 珍妮特，你的工作找得怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: I found the ideal position. I’m working for a plumbing company.我找到了一份很理想的工作。我在一家铅管公司工作。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我找到了一份很理想的工作。我在一家铅管公司工作。

conversations.english: Now, Miss Childs passed on your resume to me and I’ve had the chance to look it over and I must say I’m quite impressed.蔡尔兹小姐请把你的简历递给我。我能有机会来仔细看看，我必须说我对你印象深刻。
conversations.chinese: 蔡尔兹小姐请把你的简历递给我。我能有机会来仔细看看，我必须说我对你印象深刻。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you very much. I’ve tried to keep it short and clear. If there’s any questions please feel free to ask me.非常感谢。我尽量让简历简单明了。如果有问题，请尽管问我。
conversations.reply_chinese: 非常感谢。我尽量让简历简单明了。如果有问题，请尽管问我。

conversations.english: Good morning. My name's Jason Smith.早上好，我叫杰森史密斯。
conversations.chinese: 早上好，我叫杰森史密斯。
conversations.reply_english: Ah, good morning, Mr. Smith. Nice to meet you. I'm Peter Anderson from Personnel. Do sit down.噢，早上好，史密斯先生。很高兴见到你。我是人事部的皮特安德森。请坐。
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，早上好，史密斯先生。很高兴见到你。我是人事部的皮特安德森。请坐。
